list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add user update functionality and dynamic PipBoy updating UI
Introduced `updateUser` and `updateUserHandler` for modifying user data. Enhanced the `Updating` page with a reusable and dynamic `PipBoyUpdating` component for updating visual states. Updated session management and UI elements to support the new features seamlessly.

task.summary:
Refactor terminal layout and update PWA assets.
Reorganized terminal layout components with scoped styles and modular paths. Simplified PWA assets, replacing unused icons while refining manifest configurations. Removed redundant CSS and optimized file structure for improved maintainability.

Replace SVG home icon with image and add static assets
Replaced the hardcoded SVG home icon in BaseDock with an image file for better flexibility and maintainability. Added several new static image assets to the project for future use.

Fix redundant newlines in base-dock.tsx
Removed unnecessary blank lines at the end of the file to ensure cleaner code formatting. This change improves readability and adheres to coding standards.

Replace submit input with button and update button styles
Replaced the input element for form submission with a button element for consistency and improved styling flexibility. Updated CSS to include focus and hover styles for buttons, aligning them with existing style rules for form controls.

Add session management with cookies and cleanup unused code
Introduced session handling functions (update, clear, retrieve) utilizing cookies for user authentication and state management. Removed unused signal state initialization in login and register pages. Updated dependencies and configurations to support the new session management approach.

Refactor user session handling and improve logout logic
Updated session management to utilize reactive signals and memoization. Enhanced logout functionality to provide navigation to the login page upon success and improved error handling across components. Removed unnecessary `createEffect` calls and optimized usage of `currentUser`.

Fix currentUser check in terminal navigation component
Updated the conditional logic to properly call the currentUser function. This ensures accurate rendering of the "LOGIN" link based on user authentication state.

Add comprehensive character data templates and origin details
Introduced JSON files for character templates and origins, including attributes, skills, perks, and starting equipment for different archetypes (e.g., Vault Dweller, Survivor). These additions provide an extensive foundation for character creation and development in the game system.

MESSAGE.value:
Refactor terminal layout and update PWA assets.
Reorganized terminal layout components with scoped styles and modular paths. Simplified PWA assets, replacing unused icons while refining manifest configurations. Removed redundant CSS and optimized file structure for improved maintainability.

Replace SVG home icon with image and add static assets
Replaced the hardcoded SVG home icon in BaseDock with an image file for better flexibility and maintainability. Added several new static image assets to the project for future use.

Fix redundant newlines in base-dock.tsx
Removed unnecessary blank lines at the end of the file to ensure cleaner code formatting. This change improves readability and adheres to coding standards.

Update navigation, add routing transitions, and improve styles
Updated the navigation link to point to '/about' instead of '#'. Integrated `@zag-js/presence` to manage routing transitions with animations. Enhanced styling with improved global CSS, retro monitor animations, and better layout consistency. Added smooth scrolling for anchor links.

Replace submit input with button and update button styles
Replaced the input element for form submission with a button element for consistency and improved styling flexibility. Updated CSS to include focus and hover styles for buttons, aligning them with existing style rules for form controls.

Add session management with cookies and cleanup unused code
Introduced session handling functions (update, clear, retrieve) utilizing cookies for user authentication and state management. Removed unused signal state initialization in login and register pages. Updated dependencies and configurations to support the new session management approach.

Refactor user session handling and improve logout logic
Updated session management to utilize reactive signals and memoization. Enhanced logout functionality to provide navigation to the login page upon success and improved error handling across components. Removed unnecessary `createEffect` calls and optimized usage of `currentUser`.

Fix currentUser check in terminal navigation component
Updated the conditional logic to properly call the currentUser function. This ensures accurate rendering of the "LOGIN" link based on user authentication state.

Add comprehensive character data templates and origin details
Introduced JSON files for character templates and origins, including attributes, skills, perks, and starting equipment for different archetypes (e.g., Vault Dweller, Survivor). These additions provide an extensive foundation for character creation and development in the game system.

Add user update functionality and dynamic PipBoy updating UI
Introduced `updateUser` and `updateUserHandler` for modifying user data. Enhanced the `Updating` page with a reusable and dynamic `PipBoyUpdating` component for updating visual states. Updated session management and UI elements to support the new features seamlessly.
